original: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na aupekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nanaupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na na aupekkhā sahagataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na aupekkhā sahagatam ca na na aupekkhā sahagatam ca dhammam paṭicca na aupekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava
